body_html:
I just cloned google/re2 alone and ran

bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --verbose_failures --genrule_strategy=standalone --spawn_strategy=standalone :re2

I get no errors and bazel-bin is populated appropriately.

body:
I just cloned google/re2 alone and ran

`bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --verbose_failures --genrule_strategy=standalone --spawn_strategy=standalone :re2`

I get no errors and bazel-bin is populated appropriately.
